abstract: Two events, a new site for a movie museum in Los Angeles and the sale of a discount chain store, combine to bring the question of Johnie's fate to the forefront.
snippet: Two events, a new site for a movie museum in Los Angeles and the sale of a discount chain store, combine to bring the question of Johnie's fate to the forefront.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences

lead_paragraph: LOS ANGELES - If the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences really plunks its new movie museum in the old May Company building on the corner of Wilshire Boulevard and Fairfax Avenue, should Johnie's Coffee Shop Restaurant - just across the street - be the first exhibit?

headline.main: A Diner With a Past and an Uncertain Future
